title: Chiefs OT stunner over Chargers, Patriots-Colts rivalry renewed, Browns COVID update, Most Underrated CB's, and NFL Week 15 picks!
itunes:title: Chiefs OT stunner over Chargers, Patriots-Colts rivalry renewed, Browns COVID update, Most Underrated CB's, and NFL Week 15 picks!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, Rachel Bonnetta and Fmr NFL CB Charles Tillman were amazed by the Chiefs OT comeback win over the Chargers on Thursday Night Football. The Patriots-Colts rivalry has started a new chapter without Brady and Manning and Peter gives his five favorite moments in the history of the matchup. Charles and Peter look back at the most underrated NFL cornerbacks of all time along before we wrap the week with picks for the upcoming Week 15.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
